ENV JENKINS_HOME /var/jenkins_home # define url prefix for running jenkins behind Apache (https://wiki.jenkins-ci.org/display/JENKINS/Running+Jenkins+behind+Apache) ENV JENKINS_PREFIX / # for main web interface: EXPOSE 8080 # will be used by attached slave agents: EXPOSE 50000 CMD ["/usr/local/bin/jenkins.sh"]
